channel.title: iPhone web browsers
channel.description:
Anybody use other browsers on their iphone other than safari?
If so, are they better? Do any have tabbing? How's the stability? Plugins available?
discuss

item.title: iPhone web browsers
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:13, topic:367409”][quote author=zoltanman link=topic=463576.msg3393117#msg3393117 date=1289114197]

Please stop.

What the fuck are you talking about?

Stop using iphone please.

Nothing wrong with it. So I’ll keep using it.

You are ignorant.

At least tell me what you think is wrong with it.
[/quote]Android is more personalized in my opinion. iOS is cleaner though I must say. Android is way more simpler though and has the potential to be better than iOS. There are many pros and cons to each.[/quote]

I can agree about it being more customizable. A jailbroken iPhone can be customized to anything you can imagine of. I just personally like keeping it at default because it looks a lot cleaner.

Read full topic

item.title: iPhone web browsers
item.dc:creator: @mapu mapu
item.description:
@mapu wrote:

x united x:

okay?wtf u wanna do on ur iphone like play runescape or watch porn lmao

Neither. It would just be good to see some diversity instead of being forced by apple to use whatever they want me to use as a browser.

item.title: iPhone web browsers
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:7, topic:367409”][quote author=pure2ownage link=topic=463576.msg3392164#msg3392164 date=1289045654]

[quote author=John459 link=topic=463576.msg3391652#msg3391652 date=1288995124]

Please stop.

What the fuck are you talking about?

Stop using iphone please.
[/quote]FUCK ANDRIODS, SYMBIAN THINGY FTW
[/quote]Actually, the rate of progress for Android is easily over 100% greater than that of iOS. iOS has been out for how long? And Android is still able to keep up with it after being out for only a few years. In the next version of Droid and iPhone, I’m positive the Droid 3 will be better than that of iPhone 4G or whatever they’re gonna call it.

I do however own the iPhone 4, and I keep it at stock. I haven’t jailbroken it because jailbreaking it, more often than not, makes it a whole lot slower. I feel this way about most of the defaults in iOS, so I just use Safari. I don’t plan on implementing anything from Android into the iPhone, because it obviously wasn’t made for the iPhone. The Android browser was made specifically to be run off of Android operating system. When they make an “Android Browser App” they don’t make it so it runs fast off of iOS, they just make it so it runs.[/quote]Instead of buying an iPhone I decided to buy a Nokia N8 which runs the Symbian^3 OS, I have to admit it does work pretty much flawless for me; due to never owning a phone which runs on the Andriod OS I cannot say anything without being bias however I have heard good things about the Andriod OS.

Read full topic

item.title: iPhone web browsers
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:6, topic:367409”][quote author=John459 link=topic=463576.msg3391652#msg3391652 date=1288995124]

Please stop.

What the fuck are you talking about?

Stop using iphone please.
[/quote]FUCK ANDRIODS, SYMBIAN THINGY FTW[/quote]Actually, the rate of progress for Android is easily over 100% greater than that of iOS. iOS has been out for how long? And Android is still able to keep up with it after being out for only a few years. In the next version of Droid and iPhone, I’m positive the Droid 3 will be better than that of iPhone 4G or whatever they’re gonna call it.

I do however own the iPhone 4, and I keep it at stock. I haven’t jailbroken it because jailbreaking it, more often than not, makes it a whole lot slower. I feel this way about most of the defaults in iOS, so I just use Safari. I don’t plan on implementing anything from Android into the iPhone, because it obviously wasn’t made for the iPhone. The Android browser was made specifically to be run off of Android operating system. When they make an “Android Browser App” they don’t make it so it runs fast off of iOS, they just make it so it runs.

Read full topic
